website_summaries.verdict: The reliable shell case design offers three layers of protection. Made from a leader in the phone case space.
pros: Flip-open port covers protect jacks and ports from dust and dirt that can corrupt connections
Combination of rubber, polycarbonate, and silicone for superior protection
Comes with a convenient kickstand setup
cons: Can be a bit bulky and heavy compared to other cases, even from the OtterBox line

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: People say, "You don't need this unless you're a toddler." Well, I'm a grandma of a toddler and I dropped my iPad mini and the cheap cute flappy cover didn't help me at all. So for my new iPad mini (thanks, Grandpa!), I wanted something that would be more protective. There are things you have to deal with...like those stubborn little doors over the charger and headphone ports...but it's worth it to me not to have to worry about breaking my device. Also, you can't have the cover on the back and take pictures. That's ok with me but I thought I'd mention it.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Vee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the ipad4! Missing parts on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: This was missing the part to prop the tablet up, and also did not fit at all the way it claims to. We got the right size, it says it will fit the iPad mini 4 and it just doesn't. It shifts all the time so most times the power button can't even be used. And the volume buttons can't be used, and the camera gets obstructed. This case sucks. Sturdy though. Our iPad mini is safe, but not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Get It Open to Insert the IPad Mini
customer_reviews.text: I have an OtterBox case on my iPhone (it is my 2nd or 3rd otterbox case for my iphone) so I expected to be able to get this product working no problem. However, after 15 minutes of frustration (even read the instructions), and at least one broken nail I gave up. This one is going back and I have to find another case that will meet my needs before I trust myself to take the ipad out of the box. :-(
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: With the grandchildren around our house, this is a must. I have one tablet that I've had for years with an Otter Box on it. It's been thrown countless times, dropped on the floor, dropped sown the stairs, and survived it all. I recently bought one for my wife's tablet, and I have one for my phone. They have all hit the floor at least a few times and no damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Denopoulos

customer_reviews.title: The best of the Defender Series yet!
customer_reviews.text: Otter box has definitely out done themselves with this generation of their Defender Series . The hard plastic case is tough and engineered to protect the most common points of possible impact. The best part is the silicon outer covering that provides the perfect grip anyway you hold it while keeping from adding any bulkiness to the device unlike earlier generations of this product. It still fits in my pocket. I can’t believe I got it at such a great price because I would have been willing to pay double had I known just how great a value this product has in protecting my iPad mini 4.
customer_reviews.author: K Baker

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because I loved the sturdiness it provided by two previous iPad Mini ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I loved the sturdiness it provided by two previous iPad Mini (Gen 1). It is very sturdy and has a good quality feel. However, I do not like that the bottom protectors for the charger opens away from the screen. In the previous model it opened towards the screen and if you had the detachable hard case shell attached you could easily open and charge the device. The new flap opens away and you need to remove the detachable hard case shell.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: My iPad mini is fully protected inside this case. I’m love otter box products. They always keep my tech items safe. I wouldn’t purchase an iPad without getting an otter box for it. Yes, it adds to the weight of the item but it keeps it safe. Fir me that’s the important thing.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: Fits the iPad Mini 4 perfectly. Yes the outer case stand is odd and bulky, but this was bought for a child's iPad and child has yet to destroy it (have had it 2 months now), and this child is beyond rough with their things. I don't trust any other brand to protect our many apple products, this is probably out 10th OtterBox we have had over the last 8 years. Great products!
customer_reviews.author: KKzcar

customer_reviews.title: The most solid case I have ever seen for an ...
customer_reviews.text: The most solid case I have ever seen for an iPad - virtually indestructible. However, I was not a fan of the stand being a separate piece from the case itself.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this case! I have had an otter box on my original iPad for 4 years and have dropped it many times with no issues. I particularly like the cover that dubs as a stand when not in use. All ports fit perfectly and are fully functional. I have not had any issues using the thumb print feature. This case does have a protective cover over the glass, but you cannot tell as there are no issues with typing or swiping. I popped this out of my iPhone otter box because it interfered, however the one for the mini 4 is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ReadL8

customer_reviews.title: Ok case but...
customer_reviews.text: This case was good and protected my iPad well, but it is very bulky and I eventually took it off because it felt like it doubled the weight of the iPad. It would be great If you where giving this to a kid or if you where planning on dropping it a bunch. Otherwise I would look for something else that is a bit lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: A Mandatory Items For Your iPad Mini
customer_reviews.text: I've always put my iPad and iPhone in cases, and having gone through a few, I can recommend OtterBox cases without hesistation. It's tough, durable, and it's survived quite a bit with me. It also doesn't make your iPad much larger, so if you can stick your iPad Mini somewhere in a pocket or such, you can do it with this.
customer_reviews.author: Zakueins

customer_reviews.title: Adds a little bit of bulk but is completely worth it for the level of protection it adds.
customer_reviews.text: This really protects my iPad Mini 4 like all the OtterBox cases I have purchased for my other devices. All of the buttons and ports line up correctly. I wish Otterbox shipped their cases with a soft cloth or microfiber but it's not a deal breaker. I personally like this better then the Apple brand smart covers. I plan on taking this with me to Starbucks. I wanted to make sure my device was protected before someone walking by had an oops and spilled coffee on it or something.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Get this case now
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with this case. I replaced my son’s iPad mini 1 with an iPad mini 4. I had the equivalent case on the one for almost 7 years now and it’s worked perfectly after being dropped a few times. This case is a tank and the stand is superb. I have one on my iPad mini 3 also.
customer_reviews.author: DrTre

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad Mini 4 protector
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy, well made, and a great protector. I don't like that when placed horizontally in the stand that it keeps popping out. I have to be very careful that it doesn't pop out when I'm playing a game and have it resting on my kitchen island. No way do I want it to hit the floor from that height onto the tiled floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hall

customer_reviews.title: Seems good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. All of the layers of support leave the iPad 4 mini well insulated and protected. I would rate it 4.5 stars because there is a small black speck in the middle of the plastic protective screen.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Odle

customer_reviews.title: Not as perfect as other otter box products.
customer_reviews.text: My old iPad mini case had the perfect prop for setting on the table or desk. The way this one is made, there isn't as good of a spot on the bottom side to hold the ipad in the prop, so I kinda have to set it in crooked to make it stay.
customer_reviews.author: John Scott

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but has very good durability and protection
customer_reviews.text: Durable otter box case. Has a couple of layers so it can withstand a drop to the ground very well. A little pricey compared to other cases, but that’s what you pay to get more durability and protection for your iPad.
customer_reviews.author: seashelly

customer_reviews.title: Durable Ipad mini cover
customer_reviews.text: We need to order this cover often for our handicapped 5-year-old. It keeps her iPad safe but it is not water-proof. (She chews on the outer edge.) The clear cover separates from the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K. Jarden

customer_reviews.title: This is the case you want
customer_reviews.text: This is the case you want, if you want to keep your iPad Mini safe. Love it. The Fingerprint reader works fine thru the case too.
customer_reviews.author: Mikael Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best phone case I’ve ever had. I would definitely buy one for any phone. Have dropped phone 15-20 times. No damage. Great product. One problem is the belt clip breaks with continued use. The small part where the phone clips in.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Great OtterBox! My son's iPad mini 4 goes through hell. He has autism and doesn't care for his things very well. This OtterBox is a life saver! Buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Christy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED THIS CASE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED THIS CASE. I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY TWO YEAR OLD SON AND IT HAS SAVED THE IPad FROM BREAKING SEVERAL TIMES. SUPER EASY TO PUT ON THE iPad. THE PROTECTIVE SCREEN IS ALSO GREAT. MY SON TOUCHES IT WITH DIRTY HANDS AND I JUST WIPE IT OFF AND IT KEEPS WORKING GREAT. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE THAT HAS KIDS AND WHAT SOMETHING TO PROTECT IT FROM FALLS. I WOULD PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: YESSIBB

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo happy!
customer_reviews.text: It came and got perfectly. I’m never disappointed with this brand. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: A necessary addition for your lab top.it is the top one on the market today
customer_reviews.text: Great protection got my lab top. Takes mild beatings and gives a secure feeling being able to take lab top anywhere. Hard to,put on bc I have a hard time w directions and it’s tightfitting to keep it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Liz prewitt

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and feel
customer_reviews.text: Got this case for my sons ipad mini 4 and its perfect, to be honest i used a glass screen protector and removed the original film. For the case itself it serves its purpose as my son is the type that will just trow it down or drop it at times and so far it hold up. I also like the feel of it but again without the film
customer_reviews.author: Ant toe knee

customer_reviews.title: Tough stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the best case for rough kids. We love the hard shell that converts to a stand for easy watching. It has saved our iPads through many drops and hits.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: otterboxes are worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new Otterbox simply for the stand. The ipad cover itself still in great shape, but the stand had failed due to a drop in just the wrong place. Have Otterboxes on all my devices...and they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product on my iPads for years. Never had a cracked screen or dented frame!
customer_reviews.author: IP Guy

customer_reviews.title: amazing little thing!
customer_reviews.text: This otter box ALSO works for Ipad Mini 5(2019), no need to wait for the newest one, if you already have that model!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bell

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox strong
customer_reviews.text: Has protected my device thru thick and thin. Device is still in one piece thanks to this OtterBox!
customer_reviews.author: Hooded Avenger

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended this for destructive kids.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best iPad covers if you don’t want to worry. I have 2 boys and they both are plenty destructive. Sometimes they destroy things by accident like iPads. So for those moments you need a case you can count on to really protect it from a fall, this is your case.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Good product, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected. Fit my IPad Mini 4 as it should. Actually makes holding the device easier
customer_reviews.author: Cody W. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: 3 Years Strong
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased about 3 years ago now. Still on and still functional. I have never been disappointed in OtterBox equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fagairo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Ipad 4 Mini
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to protect my ipad 4 mini while using dji mavic mini...highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong protection of my iPad Which it was?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product explanation mark very sturdy I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: gail gable

customer_reviews.title: Helps tablet not brake
customer_reviews.text: Love this case for my son since he drops the tablet a lot. A
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, will definitely keep my sons iPad protected
customer_reviews.author: Rick courtney

customer_reviews.title: if you break it with this you don't need a ipad
customer_reviews.text: your paying for the name but if you have kids and iPad this is th only way to go
customer_reviews.author: Angi67

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and durability.
customer_reviews.text: OtterBox products never disappoint. This case was purchased for my sons iPad and he’s not exactly kind to it. When the case is removed to be cleaned, the iPad is in just as good physical condition as the day we put the case on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cpt. Smeback

customer_reviews.title: Love the Defender Series.... a must have if you or grandchildren drop things!
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year old granddaughter so my "Pad" takes a beating. It has survived many drops. The first thing we do when we get a new device is buy an otterbox Defender to protect it. The devices are all going strong.
customer_reviews.author: mcklouky

customer_reviews.title: Otter Box is great as usual
customer_reviews.text: Love the stand feature that also helps protect the screen when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Showing its age about a year later
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this about a year ago... the cover for the home button is starting to peel away. Other than that, it's solid, and it has successfully protected the device from many drops.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case! Wish it came in other colors, but overall I would highly recommend this case. It has a stand inside if you need it, so the weight is not so much of an issue. Great job, Otters!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Linginfelter

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids and teens with iPads. Durable and nice styling. We struggled to actually get it on the iPad but eventually we figured it out
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: Best protection
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line protection. Got the block one and works perfect. I cracked two glass protectors placing my iPad in backpack with the spec case I had and that on blocked the speakers. Glad I finally purchased this one and No more problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox Defender for IPAD Mini 4. - mt
customer_reviews.text: Fit the IPAD Mini 4 very well. Son was extremely thankful, since he was looking for a replacement case. His old one broke.
customer_reviews.author: MT- San Fran

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put together but definitely worth it once its on there.
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh pierce

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good case!
customer_reviews.text: When I got the package, I open the amazon wrapping and found that the package was torn and opened. I thought it was just a factory mistake so I went ahead and opened it. The product was fine, and so I put it on. It was definitely difficult to put on. I had to put a lot of strength to put it on. Overall, it’s a pretty good product, and I’m not mad about it.
customer_reviews.author: sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters iPad mini. Works great and has survived several drops.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, hard to take off.
customer_reviews.text: I found this case is very good for drops, but it's somewhat hard to take it off to clean it, and, if a bit of water accidentally gets on it, it could slip down through the camera opening.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Monster

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Missing part to use as stand up with device. Extremely disappointed given $$$ paid
customer_reviews.author: carj

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sorry!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I’m an Otterbax fan. This is an awesome case for my Mini4!!!
customer_reviews.author: Herman Bates

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: So far has survived my daughter! Took at least a 12 foot fall off bleachers on to concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit ipad mini 4
customer_reviews.text: The item is not as described. It comes in a box that says its for the ipad mini 4, but it does not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Love these cases!
customer_reviews.text: Tough case! Easy to put on! Holds up to little children as well as butter finger adults.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B

customer_reviews.title: need it
customer_reviews.text: need it with urgency because my son is a professional 4 year destroyer and cant affort to buy ipads very often
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not “drop-proof” at all!!
customer_reviews.text: The very first day we put this on our iPad, we dropped it accidentally and the screen cracked. I’ve never written a review but I just had to write this. This is not “drop-proof” whatsoever. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Otterbox is known for long lasting products and protection. I had broke my ipad and i want to make sure this never happened again.
customer_reviews.author: AJ C. Adiviso

customer_reviews.title: Good and tough
customer_reviews.text: Great product only problem is the screen cover is unresponsive and it can be annoying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case performs above expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great case, I wish they made a full seal iPad case, it definitely performs its job, the back case loves to gather dust and lint, sometimes even hair. I know my iPad will be safe and secure with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well protected.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My kids have dropped their tablets many times and no cracks. Well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Papi_surge&Fancy

customer_reviews.title: Not drop proof!
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay and what it's said to do, I'm quite disappointed! My son dropped it 2X the 1st resulted in a fine fracture, the 2nd was all she wrote 😔😩
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best protection for
customer_reviews.text: I wish these came in more colors. Best protection for Ipad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this case for iPad Mini 4
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well. Had a bit of a challenge putting it on because the directions weren't that clear. Fits perfectly. All the ports and holes line up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bicyclegirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mom and it’s perfect protects her brand new iPad with no worries
customer_reviews.author: Carine Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy this product on amazon again
customer_reviews.text: Horrible it did not fit properly could not turn the volume up or down. Had to take the hold thing apart.
customer_reviews.author: Dorethea Paul

customer_reviews.title: So Worth It.
customer_reviews.text: Left my iPad out in the rain one day like an idiot. Got home and it was perfectly fine. Wiped off the water from the case and it was as good as new. These are worth every penny. Thanks OB.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very hefty, nice protection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protection. Makes the ipad bulckier but rather deal with this than a broken screen. Good access to all buttons
customer_reviews.author: E. Sandoya

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice
customer_reviews.text: OtterBox continues to be a great choice for rugged protection. Highly recommend if you have children orbare prone to dropping your iPad.

customer_reviews.title: You might not like the charging and earphone cover
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the little covers over the charging and headphone ports. Hard to open,so off they came. I am satisfied with the case overall. I had a iPad before and dropped it. The screen shattered. Hope this one protects better.
customer_reviews.author: William Grabler

customer_reviews.title: Good solid otterbox!
customer_reviews.text: Otterbox durability as expected, the stand was a little confusing at first. But it is a great product.

customer_reviews.title: Tough and strong
customer_reviews.text: It’s on my 8 years olds iPad. This holds up to kid tough. He hasn’t dropped it but if he was to I’m sure it would hold up

customer_reviews.text: I swear by OtterBox! As of so far, they are the BEST protection you can find for your devices.

customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy a cheap version, buy the real thing or you may regret it! This case has protected our iPad through several falls/drips with the kids!

customer_reviews.text: This product is a Worthy Investment for your IPad I Highly Recommend It.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. While OtterBox cases are more expensive then ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt best protective case I have ever bought.

customer_reviews.title: BEST CASE
customer_reviews.text: Works really great!I love it,it really keeps your iPad safe
customer_reviews.author: Clueless

customer_reviews.title: A sound investment for the protection of my device.
customer_reviews.text: My case arrived in the frustration free packaging. Was easy to open and even easier to install. I like the Otterbox line of cases for all my apple products. I cannot say I've ever had an issue with them that let me down. The volume buttons line up and the flaps over any ports are easy to remove and durable enough to be used repeatedly without eventually just breaking off. With my iPad 4 mini in my Otterbox case I don't have any concerns about damage coming about from having dropped it. I do not use the included stand function so I can't comment about how effective it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sympathetic Vendor

customer_reviews.title: Works great and gives me peace of mind when carrying from ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and gives me peace of mind when carrying from place to place.The stand works great and is also a great cover.
customer_reviews.author: marberman

customer_reviews.title: Best protective case for the Ipads
customer_reviews.text: I have this case on two iPad minis 3 and 4 and my iPad 2. Always a very durable case. Never had any problems with it. Item came on time as well.
customer_reviews.author: SMull

customer_reviews.title: Screen Cracked
customer_reviews.text: My iPad dropped from a couch onto carpet and cracked while it was in this case. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love knowing my iPad is safe!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm very happy I chose this OtterBox case for my brand new iPad. It's safe and protected no matter how I use it and I love the stand feature. I use this a lot for personal use and for my non-profit org I belong to and functions great. The only "frustrating" thing is when I remove the cover sometimes I have to put more effort into lifting one of the corners, other than that, its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Fits snug.  Fits the fourth generation iPad 4 mini.
customer_reviews.text: After assembly, I can clearly see that this Otterbox will provide excellent protection. Yes, it makes it larger and heavier but that's the price you pay. Your iPad's settings will show you your model number and the Apple website has an article that tells you which model number corresponds to which generation. Easy peasy. Assembly just like the Otterbox on my Samsung Galaxy phone.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Miller

customer_reviews.title: You can't kill an OtterBox
customer_reviews.text: You just can't kill an OtterBox ... whether for iPads, or cell phones. They will make your device thicker due to the design and protection level. But it does exactly what it promises. I have dropped my cell countless times ... and never an y damage. Thankfully i haven't tried too damage my iPad yet. but I'm comfortable this will keep it safe and secure as well. NOT waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Earl

customer_reviews.title: Strong and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Otterbox will always be the best case imo. I have yet to drop my tablet so I cant give it a true review based on reliability but it feels solid and looks like it would stand up to just about any typical drop from waist height. The built in screen protector is a nice feature as well. I also thought the thumb code button wouldnt be responsive since the case covers it but I haven't had any issues with it what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Protection at its finest
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this case for our granddaughters iPad. She is pretty good with it but being an 8 year old, it still gets dropped from time to time. This case provides ample protection to keep it safe from those drops. The back also serves as a stand which she uses often. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Denstl

product_meta.title: Otterbox Defender Series Case for Ipad Mini 4 - Retail Packaging - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BLACKThe OtterBox Defender Series Case for Apple IPad Mini 4 Provides Heavy Duty Protection Against Drops, Dust and Damage Without Taking Away From the Usability of Your Phone's Features. The Defender Series Case Offers Triple-Layer Protection and Is Built From a High-Impact Polycarbonate Shell, Durable Silicone Slipcover and a Built-In Screen Protector, Making It One of the Toughest Cases on the Market. Why Else Do You Think We Called It the Defender Series?
feature_bullets: Triple-layer defense: inner shell, outer cover and touchscreen protector
Screen protection: built in to keep your brilliant display flawless
Port covers: stop dirt, dust and lint from getting into jacks and ports
Shield stand: includes stand for hands-free convenience ;
materials: Polycarbonate inner shell ;Internal foam padding ; Synthetic rubber outer slipcover ; Built-in screen protector
